resources.string: Manage Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Airplane mode, mobile networks, and VPNs
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
You have lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off
Allow data roaming? You may incur significant roaming charges!
Set date, time, time zone, & formats
Show owner info on lock screen
Enter text to display on lock screen
Set My Location, screen unlock, SIM card lock, credential storage lock
Set My Location, screen unlock, credential storage lock
Password required to decrypt device each time you turn it on

"You can encrypt accounts, settings, downloaded applications and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your device, a password will be required to decrypt it each time you power it on.
Encryption takes an hour or more. Start with a charged battery and keep device plugged in until encryption is completed. Interrupting may lose some or all data"
Charge battery to above 80% and try again
Plug in charger and try again
Set screen unlock password before you can start encryption
Encrypt device? Operation irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption could take an hour or more, during which device will restart several times
Wait while device is encrypted. ^1% complete
Unable to complete encryption due to interruption. Perform factory data reset (erasing all your data) before use. After resetting, try encrypting device again
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password security
Choose a method to lock the screen
"When Face Unlock can't see you, how do you want to unlock?"
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Password must be at least %d characters
PIN must be at least %d characters
Password must be fewer than %d characters
PIN must be fewer than %d digits
Device administrator disallows using a recent PIN
Password must contain at least one letter
Password must contain at least one digit
Password must contain at least one symbol
Password must meet requirements. Contact IT administrator
Device administrator disallows using a recent password
Manage connections, set device name, and visibility
Enter PIN to pair with %s (Try 0000 or 1234)
You may also need to enter this PIN on the other device
You may also need to enter this passkey on the other device
Confirm passkey is %2$s to pair with %1$s

To pair with:
%1$s

Type on it:
%2$s, then press Return or Enter
Unable to pair with %1$s. Incorrect PIN or password
To see devices, turn Bluetooth on
%1$s will be disconnected from media audio
%1$s will be disconnected from handsfree audio
%1$s will be disconnected from input device
Internet access via %1$s will be disconnected
"%1$s will be disconnected from sharing this phone's Internet connection"
Not connected to file transfer server
Connected to device for Internet access
Sharing local Internet connection with device
Allow data exchange when the phone touches another device
Ready to transmit app content via NFC
Unavailable because NFC is turned off

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed"
Set up and manage portable Wi-Fi hotspots
"Unable to open WAPI certificates Credential storage might not enable"
"WAPI authentication failed Please check validity of certificates"
Notify me when an open network is available
"Don't use a Wi-Fi network unless it has a good Internet connection"
There was a problem changing the setting
To see available networks, turn on Wi-Fi
Type the PIN %1$s on the access point
WPS is already in progress and can take tens of seconds to complete
The network was avoided due to poor connection. Turn off this behavior from the Settings > Wi-Fi screen, Advanced menu item
Another Wi-Fi protected session was detected. Try again in a few minutes
Specify the frequency range of operation
There was a problem setting the frequency band
Type a network prefix length between 0 and 32
Enable Wi-Fi Direct to set up peer-to-peer connectivity

Wi-Fi Direct enables Wi-Fi devices to connect directly, making printing, file sharing, synchronising, and screen sharing much simpler and more convenient. Connecting to devices that support Wi-Fi Direct makes it possible to share your content, synchronise your data, socialise with friends, play games, audio, videos, and more, using various applications
Do you want to cancel this connecting session?
There has been no activity for %1$d minutes since Wi-Fi Direct was enabled. Disabling Wi-Fi Direct can extend battery life. Continue?
Enabling Wi-Fi Direct will disable the portable Wi-Fi hotspot
Connected with %1$d devices via Wi-Fi Direct
You can connect up to %d devices at the same time
Insert SIM for using portable Wi-Fi hotspot include tethering
Security policy restricts use of Wi-Fi
Security policy restricts use of Internet sharing
Use incoming call volume for notifications
Set volume for music and videos
Audio settings for the attached dock
Music, video, games, and other media
Settings for the attached desktop dock
Settings for the attached car dock
You must dock the phone before setting up dock audio
Play sound when inserting or removing phone from dock
"Don't play sound when inserting or removing phone from dock"
Switch orientation automatically when rotating phone
Switch orientation automatically when rotating phone
Adjust the brightness of the screen
Will start upon sleep if connected to power
"Can't change SIM card lock state. Possibly incorrect PIN"
Unmount SD card, view available storage
Unmount the SD card so you can safely remove it
Insert an SD card for mounting
Erases all data on the internal USB storage, such as music and photos
Erases all data on the SD card, such as music and photos
If you unmount the SD card, some apps you are using will stop and may be unavailable until you remount the SD card.
"Couldn't unmount SD card. Try again later."
Lets you transfer media files on Windows, or using Android File Transfer on Mac (see www.android.com/filetransfer)
"Lets you transfer photos using camera software, and transfer any files on computers that don't support MTP"
MNC field must be 2 or 3 digits.

"This will erase all data from your phone's "internal storage", including:
"
Your Google account" "
System and app data and settings" "
Downloaded apps

"
You are currently signed into the following accounts: "

"
To clear music, pictures, and other user data, the "SD card needs to be erased.
Erase all the data on the internal USB storage, such as music or photos
Erase all the data on the SD card, such as music or photos
"Erase all your personal information and downloaded apps? You can't reverse this action!"
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm a factory data reset.
"No reset was performed because the System Clear service isn't available."
Erases all data on the SD card
Erase all USB storage? You will lose all stored data!
Erase the SD card? You will lose all data on the card!
"Erase the USB storage, deleting all files stored there? You can't reverse this action!"
"Erase the SD card, deleting all files stored there? You can't reverse this action!"
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm that you want to erase the USB storage.
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm that you want to erase the SD card.
Set up voicemail, call forwarding, call waiting, caller ID
"Can't tether when USB storage is in use"
"Sharing this phone's Internet connection to 1 device"
"Sharing this phone's Internet connection to %1$d devices"
Let apps use data from sources such as Wi-Fi and mobile networks to determine your approximate location
Let apps use GPS to pinpoint your location
Use server to assist GPS (uncheck to reduce network usage)
Use server to assist GPS (uncheck to improve GPS performance)
Let Google use your location to improve search results and other services
Enhance positioning and save power using sensors
Enhance positioning and save power using sensors

Sensors enhance pedestrian positioning and save battery power. When indoors or underground, sensors work best if handset is aligned with direction of movement. Distorted magnetic fields will affect performance
View legal info, status, software version
Learn how to use your phone
There is a problem loading the licenses.
"You don't have a data connection. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet."
Connect at least %d dots. Try again:
Must draw pattern to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock pattern

"Protect your phone from unauthorized use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. Slide your finger to connect at least four dots in any order on the next screen.
Ready to start? Touch Next."
Manage apps, set up quick launch shortcuts

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
"You've chosen to launch this app by default for some actions."
This app may not be designed for your screen. You can control how it adjusts to your screen here.
"All this app's data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc."
"The app wasn't found in the list of installed apps."
All updates to this Android system app will be uninstalled.
This app can access the following on your phone:
"You don't have any third-party apps installed."
"System updates can't be installed on external media."
If you force stop an app, it may misbehave.
Change the preferred installation location for new apps
If you disable a built-in app, other apps may misbehave.
View and control currently running services
This service was started by its app. Stopping it may cause the app to fail.
"This app can't safely be stopped. If you stop it, you may lose some of your current work."
"This is an old app process that is still running in case it's needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it."
%1$s: currently in use. Touch Settings to control it.
If you stop this service, some features of your phone may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
Press Space key twice to insert \".\"
This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this input method?
This spell checker may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this spell checker?
"You don't have any words in the user dictionary. Add a word by touching the Add (+) button."
Set keyboard shortcuts to launch apps
Your shortcut for %1$s (%2$s) will be cleared.
Debug mode when USB is connected
Screen will never sleep while charging
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification, and read log data.

"When Explore by Touch is turned on, you can hear or see descriptions of what's under your finger.
This feature is for low-vision users."
%1$s can collect all of the text you type, except passwords. This includes personal data such as credit card numbers. It can also collect data about your interactions with the phone.
TalkBack provides spoken feedback to help blind and low-vision users. Do you want to install it for free from Android Market?
Do you want apps to install scripts from Google that make their web content more accessible?
This feature changes the way your device responds to touch. Turn on?
What has been using the battery
Battery used when phone is idle
Switch to airplane mode to save power in areas with no cell coverage
Battery used by the display and backlight
Reduce the screen brightness and/or screen timeout
"Turn off Wi-Fi when not using it or when it isn't available"
"Turn off Bluetooth when you aren't using it"
Try connecting to a different Bluetooth device
Manually control GPS to prevent app from using it
The app may offer settings to reduce battery use
Default settings below override app settings
Sets the speech synthesis engine to be used for spoken text
Speed at which the text is spoken
Affects the tone of the spoken text
Sets the language-specific voice for the spoken text
Play a short demonstration of speech synthesis
Install the voice data required for speech synthesis
Voices required for speech synthesis already properly installed
Your settings have changed. This is an example of how they sound.
The engine you selected is unable to run

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?
Type the password for credential storage.
The password must have at least 8 characters.
Incorrect password. You have one more chance before credential storage is erased.
Incorrect password. You have %1$d more chances before credential storage is erased.
You must set a lock screen PIN or password before you can use credential storage.
Set behavior when an emergency call is placed
Back up app data, Wi-Fi passwords, and other settings to Google servers
No account is currently storing backed up data
When reinstalling an app, restore backed up settings and data
Select to change or remove the password for desktop full backups
Stop backing up your Wi-Fi passwords, bookmarks, other settings, and app data, plus erase all copies on Google servers?
Activating this administrator will allow the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
This administrator is active and allows the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
Touch a network to connect to it
"You can't configure an EAP Wi-Fi connection during setup. After setup, you can do that in Settings > Wireless & networks"
Connecting can take a few minutes…

Touch Next" to continue with setup.
Touch "Back to connect to a different Wi-Fi network
Sync is currently experiencing problems. It will be back shortly.
Apps can sync, send, and receive data at any time
Disabling background data extends battery life and lowers data use. Some apps may still use the background data connection.
Welcome to Google sync!" A Google approach to synchronizing data to allow access to your contacts, appointments, and more from wherever you are. "
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the phone!
This account is required by some apps. You can only remove it by resetting the phone to factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data) in Settings > Backup & reset.
Sync for this item is currently disabled. To change this setting, temporarily turn on background data and automatic sync.
The service is busy. Try again.
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread
Screen overlay showing current touch data
Flash areas of screen when they update
Screen overlay showing current CPU usage
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves it
Show App Not Responding dialog for background apps
Day of month to reset data usage cycle:
No apps used data during this period.
Measured by your device. Your service provider may account for data usage differently
Disable background data on mobile data network only. Wi-Fi will be used if available.
To restrict background data for this app, first set a mobile data limit.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when Wi-Fi isn't available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"Restricting background data is possible only when you've set a mobile data limit."

%1$s data connection will be disabled when specified limit is reached. Data usage is measured by your device, and your service provider may account for usage differently, so consider using a conservative limit
"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."
Permanently remove the user CA certificate?

"After you turn on Explore by Touch, you can touch the screen to learn what's under your finger. For example, the current screen contains app icons. Find one of them by touching the screen and sliding your finger around."
Good. Keep sliding your finger around the screen until you find at least one more icon.
"To activate something that you're touching, tap it. Slide your finger until you find the icon for the %s. Then tap the icon once to activate it."
Your finger is touching the %s icon. Tap once to activate the icon.
Your finger moved over the %s icon, and then moved away. Slowly slide your finger around the screen until you find the Browser icon again.
Good. To move to the next lesson, find and activate the %s button, located near the bottom-right corner of the screen.

To scroll through a list, you can slide two fingers along the screen. For example, the current screen contains a list of app names that can scroll up or down. First, try to identify a few items in the list by sliding one finger around.
Good. Keep sliding your finger around to find at least one more item.
Now place two fingers on an item in the list and slide both fingers up. If you reach the top of the screen, lift your fingers, place them lower on the list, and continue sliding up.
Good. Keep sliding your fingers up to scroll some more.
You have completed the tutorial. To exit, find and touch the %s button.
Type your current full backup password here
Type a new password for full backups here

Add or edit recipients of SIM card changed alert message
Allows phone to be locked, tracked, and data to be wiped remotely

Remote Controls can minimize the risk of losing your personal information by allowing you to lock and wipe your missing mobile remotely. Also, by using the Find my mobile feature, you can find your missing mobile. visit
Resister Samsung account, Google account, and Consent location
To activate Remote controls, add Samsung account
To activate Remote controls, add Google account
Enter another phone number including country code
Enter another phone number (including country code)
Set refresh interval and thermometer units
Network not available. When network available, weather will be displayed on lock screen
Decrypt SD card when you insert encrypted SD card.
"You can encrypt your data in SD card. Encryption could take over one hour in background. Time depends on the amount of data in SD card. So, we recommend to plug in your charger."
"You can decrypt your data in SD card. Decryption could take over one hour in background. Time depends on the amount of data in SD card. So, we recommend to plug in your charger."
"Encrypt SD card? This operation is irreversible. Encryption could takes an hour or more. But it will progress in background."
"Decrypt SD card? This operation is irreversible. Decryption could takes an hour or more. But it will progress in background."
Password required to decrypt SD card each time it is connected
Encrypt new files on SD card
New files on SD card will be encrypted
Encrypt all files on SD card
All files on SD card will be encrypted
Multimedia files on SD card will not be encrypted
Do not encrypt multimedia files on SD card
Wait until SD card encryption is completed
Wait until SD card decryption is completed
Enter your lock password, to apply encryption settings
Device will encrypt new files on SD card
Device will not encrypt new files on SD card
Device will encrypt existing files on SD card
Device will decrypt encrypted SD card
Device will not encrypt multimedia files on SD card
All open files on SD card will be closed
During this process, SD card will not be available
Encryption may take a long time depending on the amount of data. It is recommended that you plug device into charger
Decryption may take a long time depending on the amount of data. It is recommended that you plug device into charger
Error encrypting SD card. Unable to mount SD card
Encryption policies received from remote phone administrator
Unable to encrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f GB needed. Delete some files
Unable to decrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f GB needed. Delete some files
Unable to encrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f MB needed. Delete some files
Unable to decrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f MB needed. Delete some files
Error encrypting SD card. Unable to mount SD card
Error decrypting SD card. Some files may still be encrypted
Tap Continue to mount SD card
Waiting for SD card encryption or decryption...
Battery life extended but performance restricted, brightness low. Tap Power saving tips for more details
Use default settings for power saving. Settings will be enabled immediately.
Use custom settings for power saving. Settings will be enabled when battery level is below the value you set
Turn off Wi-Fi when not connected
Turn off Bluetooth when not in use
Turn off GPS when not in use
Turn off Sync when phone is not synchronising with server
Adjust the delay before the screen automatically turns off
Custom power saving mode will be enabled below %d%% battery
Turn off Wi-Fi. Turning off Wi-Fi can extend battery life.However, if you surf the Web frequently, using Wi-Fi can save more battery than using the cellular network
Turn off Bluetooth. Not using Bluetooth headset or Car home mode can extend battery life
Applications using GPS location data reduce battery life. Turning off GPS can extend battery life
Applications such as Gmail, Calendar, and Twitter are auto synced via wireless network at specific intervals. Syncing data manually can extend battery life
Lowering the brightness of the screen can extend battery life. Selecting Automatic brightness will adjust screen brightness to ambient automatically
"Set system functions below 1. Dual core max 2. Brightness 3. UI rendering speed"
1. Disabling Use packet data (Settings > Wireless and Network > Mobile networks) helps extend battery. You cannot receive MMS messages.
2. Disabling Auto sync (Settings > Account and sync) helps extend battery.
Change text size in following applications:
Turn on torch to see better
Press and hold the power key to use the accessibility shortcut under phone options
Provides mono audio for listening with one earphone

Move icons one at a time to another page in Home and Applications edit mode
Automatically prepare your device for voice commands in %s
Mute incoming calls and playing sounds
Tap and hold at two points then tilt device back and forth to reduce or enlarge screen
Move device left or right while holding selected icon to reposition it to another page
Shake to scan for Blutooth and Kies air devices
Automatically prepare your device for voice commands in %s
Mute incoming calls and playing sounds by turning phone over (except when screen off)
Pan your device to left or right while holding image to navigate around image
You can make calls using voice commands such as Call to Joe
Preparing... it could take over 10 minutes
Wait while device is decrypted.^1% complete
Decrypt device? Operation irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Decryption could take an hour or more, during which device will restart several times.

You can decrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded applications and their data, media, and other files. Decryption could takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your tablet plugged in until decryption is complete. If you interrupt the decryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Set an unlock password of at least 6 characters, containing at least 1 number
If you select this option, only used memory space will be encrypted

Wi-Fi is still connected. Turn Wi-Fi off to connect 4G network

4G network needed for using Mobile AP tethering. Turn off 4G and Mobile AP tethering.

Use 4G external modem? While 4G tethered mode, data services(i.e. Browser, MMS etc) not available. Turn this off after using for data services.
Please connect your phone to a computer using USB cable.
4G network disconnected. If you want to use the 4G external modem, please connect to the usb cable.
Press the pen button, and tap and hold on the screen. You can capture the screen, draw on it, and share it from anywhere with the pen
With the two gestures below, you can go back to the previous screen or open menus without putting the pen down
To go back, drag the pen from right to left while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the back key
To open menus, drag the pen from the bottom to top while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the menu key
To go to the home screen, drag the pen from top to bottom while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the home key
Domain name of PDG is already exist.
Domain name of PDG is empty.
Domain name of PDG is not valid.
IP address of PDG is empty.

Enable to adjust the position of dialing keypad left or right for use with one hand
Enable to adjust the position of Samsung keypad left or right for use with one hand
Enable to adjust the position of Samsung calculator keypad left or right for use with one hand
Enable to adjust the position of Pattern left or right, for use with one hand

The one-handed operation settings help you to easily use keypads with only one hand. If you tick one-handed operation, the position of the dialling keypad, samsung keypad, Calculator or Pattern can be adjusted by tapping the arrows on either side of the screen. If you tap the right arrow, the keypad slides left, and if you tap the left arrow, the keypad slides right
The small and tiny font sizes will only be applied to emails and messages.
If you forget your pattern, you can enter your backup PIN to unlock.
Enable the secure connection for the service requiring payments
You can use services requiring the Wi-Fi secure connection
You should check the option to use services requiring the Wi-Fi secure connection
